tool_description: Generates maintenance reminders and notifications based on approaching due dates and mileages with customizable lead times.

scheduled_items.description: Scheduled maintenance items with due dates

lead_time_days.description: Days before due date to send reminder (1-90)

reminder_frequency.description: How often to repeat reminders (daily, weekly, biweekly)

error_messages: Invalid vehicle ID: Vehicle not found in system.
Invalid scheduled items format: Items must include 'service:due_date:due_mileage'.
Invalid lead time: Must be between 1 and 90 days.
Unsupported reminder frequency: Use one of [daily, weekly, biweekly].
No upcoming services: No services are due within the specified lead time.
usage: Provide vehicle ID and scheduled maintenance items. The tool generates appropriate reminders based on lead time preferences and due dates.

upcoming_services.description: Services due within lead time period
